attributes.background: Time to get rid of this outdated overspending waste of public money

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you'd like a national change to how local decisions are made, or whether you're only concerned about how things work in your local area. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
